DiscoverOpportunities: Discover opportunities you never knew existed thoughtfully designed to strengthen your brand and be the envy of your competition. Let's redefine your success.
TeamAssistance: Our team is ready to assist you with every detail. Drop us an email.
Name: Name
TellUsMore: Tell us more about your inquiry and requirements
ExperienceDescription: Whether you're seeking a tranquil retreat or an active adventure, our team offers an unmatched experience that will create memories to last a lifetime across the Sri Lanka.
doINeedExperience: Do I need any prior diving experience?
doINeedExperienceAnswer: Not at all! Our beginner courses and guided dives are perfect for first-timers. Certified instructors will guide you through everything step by step.
isEquipmentProvided: Is all the diving equipment provided?
isEquipmentProvidedAnswer: Yes, we provide all high-quality diving gear including wetsuits, tanks, masks, fins, and regulators. You can also bring your own equipment if you prefer.
whatIsBestSeasonForDiving: What is the best season for diving in Sri Lanka?
whatIsBestSeasonForDivingAnswer: The west coast diving season runs from November to April, while the east coast season runs from May to October — offering year-round dive opportunities.
canNonSwimmersJoinAnswer: Absolutely! We offer introductory 'Try Dive' sessions for non-swimmers in shallow water under professional supervision.
areYouPADIcertifiedAnswer: Yes, all our dive instructors are fully PADI-certified professionals with years of teaching and diving experience.
whatShouldIBring: What should I bring for my dive?
whatShouldIBringAnswer: Bring your swimwear, towel, sunscreen, and a change of clothes. We’ll take care of everything else!
isSafetyEnsured: How do you ensure diving safety?
isSafetyEnsuredAnswer: Safety is our top priority. We use regularly maintained equipment, provide safety briefings, and ensure small group supervision by certified instructors.
howToBookDive: How can I book a dive or course?
howToBookDiveAnswer: You can book directly through our website, call us, or visit our dive center. Online booking confirmations are sent instantly.
canIUseMyOwnGear: Can I use my own diving gear?
canIUseMyOwnGearAnswer: Yes, of course! We will inspect your equipment to ensure safety standards are met before use.
whatIfBadWeather: What happens if the weather is bad?
whatIfBadWeatherAnswer: If conditions are unsafe, dives may be rescheduled or refunded. Your safety and comfort always come first.
